properties.exec.args: -Xmx3g -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -classpath %classpath org.rappsilber.fdr.CommandLine --uniquePSMs=True --psmfdr=5 --pepfdr=5 --linkfdr=5 --proteinfdr=100 --ppifdr=5 --reportfactor=100000 --maxProteinAmbiguity=1 --maxLinkAmbiguity=100 --minPeptidesPerLink=1 --minPeptidesPerProtein=1 --minPeptidesPerPPI=1 --minPeptideLength=6 --cofilter=/data/rappstore/users/lswantje/ECLP/searches_TN/cluster/extra_controls/xifdr_out/humanDB_wrongCL_bs3/cov3_delt0.15_cofilter/humanDB_wrongCL_bs3_filtered_0_false.csv --csvOutDir="/data/rappstore/users/lswantje/ECLP/searches_TN/cluster/extra_controls/xifdr_out/humanDB_wrongCL_bs3/cov3_delt0.15_cofilter/prefdr_xifdr_5/humanDB_wrongCL_bs3_ppi_grouped_0" --delimiter="," --map="run:Run,scan:Scan,peptide1:Peptide1,peptide2:Peptide2,peptide length 1:LengthPeptide1,peptide length 2:LengthPeptide2,peptide link 1:Link1,peptide link 2:Link2,is decoy 1:Protein1decoy,is decoy 2:Protein2decoy,precursor charge:PrecoursorCharge,score:match score,accession1:Protein1,accession2:Protein2,description1:Fasta1,description2:Fasta2,peptide position 1:Start1,peptide position 2:Start2,crosslinker:Crosslinker,exp charge:PrecoursorCharge,exp m/z:PrecurserMZ,exp mass:PrecursorMass,match mass:CalcMass" --csvBaseName=test /data/rappstore/users/lswantje/ECLP/searches_TN/cluster/extra_controls/xifdr_out/humanDB_wrongCL_bs3/cov3_delt0.15_cofilter/humanDB_wrongCL_bs3_filtered_0_true.csv
